title: Monarchs baseball team, first row from left: unknown man, Alvin Muldrow, Larry Bryant, Ronald Jackson, unknown, Thomas Bold, John Williams, Tyrone Scott, bat boy Gregory Benton; second row: unknown, Robert Perry, Rainey Benson, unknown, John Jackson, two unknowns, John Gobble, Kenneth Spencer, Louis or Lewis Johnson, James Colvin, and manager Alberta Broaden, posed on street corner

provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
